item.title: By: kenrick
item.dc:creator: kenrick
item.description: Man Im having a hard time using that IXR Library with extending the introspection server... it just never works. If i dont use introspection and define a class, and instead just add the funcitons to a server it works. Any ideas? I can send you a link to what im working if you are interested.
item.content:encoded: Man Im having a hard time using that IXR Library with extending the introspection server… it just never works. If i dont use introspection and define a class, and instead just add the funcitons to a server it works. Any ideas? I can send you a link to what im working if you are interested.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
Take a look at the server and client I wrote again, they both use Simon's IXR XML-RPC library. I mentioned this in the post, I even linked to it.
What I'm doing here is using his library to expose all of the PHP functions over XML-RPC.
item.content:encoded:
Take a look at the server and client I wrote again, they both use Simon’s IXR XML-RPC library. I mentioned this in the post, I even linked to it.

What I’m doing here is using his library to expose all of the PHP functions over XML-RPC.
